faq.SMS verification works by providing you: SMS verification works by providing you with a temporary phone number. When you need to verify an account, you use this number to receive the verification code. Once you receive the code, you enter it into the service you're trying to verify, completing the process.
faq.Yes, our service is completely legal. We: Yes, our service is completely legal. We provide virtual phone numbers for legitimate verification purposes. However, it's the user's responsibility to comply with the terms of service of the platforms they're verifying for.
faq.How long can I use a virtual number?: How long can I use a virtual number?
faq.The duration depends on the package you: The duration depends on the package you choose. Typically, you can use a number for the time it takes to receive and enter the verification code, which is usually a matter of minutes. Some packages may offer extended usage times.
faq.What if I don't receive the verification: What if I don't receive the verification code?
faq.If you don't receive the verification co: If you don't receive the verification code within a few minutes, you can request a new code from the service you're verifying with. If issues persist, our 24/7 customer support team is available to assist you.
faq.Which payment methods do you accept?: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.We accept a wide range of payment method: We accept a wide range of payment methods including credit cards, PayPal, and various cryptocurrencies. Check our payment page for a full list of accepted payment methods.

how.Click on the 'Sign Up' button to create: Click on the 'Sign Up' button to create your account.
how.After signing up, log in to your account: After signing up, log in to your account using your credentials.
how.Navigate to the phone number selection s: Navigate to the phone number selection section. Choose the country where you need a temporary phone number.
how.Select the specific service or platform: Select the specific service or platform (e.g., WhatsApp, Facebook) for which you need the number.
how.Browse the available numbers and select: Browse the available numbers and select one. Proceed to payment and complete the purchase.
how.Use the purchased number to receive SMS: Use the purchased number to receive SMS verification codes. Check your account dashboard for incoming messages.
how.Enter the received verification code on: Enter the received verification code on the platform you are signing up for.
how.Our service is verified and reliable. Is: Our service is verified and reliable. Issues like unavailable numbers or failed verifications are extremely rare.
